Game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

    Info about player

    Player class is used to store the color, number of minions
    and presence of building in the region for the particular Player.
    It also allows the players to place their minions
    and trouble markers in the pre-specified regions.

      • checkMinionMove

        public int checkMinionMove(int rNum)
        Method checks if a minion can be moved to a region or an adjacent area. It acts as a utility method for place minion method.
        Parameters:
        rNum - Integer represents region number
        Returns:
        Integer 1 if minion can be placed

        public int checkWinningCondition(java.lang.String personality)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        1 if any of winning conditions is established

      • checkVimes

        public int checkVimes(int numPlayers)
        Method check if CommanderVimes wins the game
        Parameters:
        numPlayers - number of players
        Returns:
        1 all player cards are already played

      • checkChrysoprase

        public int checkChrysoprase(int numPlayers)
        Method check if Chrysoprase wins the game
        Parameters:
        numPlayers - number of players
        Returns:
        1 if player has more than 50$ worth in hand (cash money + buildings - loans)

      • checkDKArms

        public int checkDKArms(int numPlayers)
        Method check if Dragon King of Arms wins the game
        Parameters:
        numPlayers - number of players
        Returns:
        1 if there are more than eight trouble markers on the board

      • checkLoad

        public int checkLoad(int numPlayers)
        Method check if Lord Selachii wins the game
        Parameters:
        numPlayers - number of players
        Returns:
        1 if player has control of 7,5 or 4 areas depends on 2,3 or 4 players

      • checkLordVetinari

        public int checkLordVetinari(int numPlayers)
        Method check if Lord Vetinari wins the game
        Parameters:
        numPlayers - number of players
        Returns:
        1 if player has minion on 11,10 or 9 areas depend on number of players 2,3 or 4

      • moveAllMinion

        public void moveAllMinion(int oldArea,
                          int newArea)
        helps move a minion from one area to another
        Parameters:
        oldArea - Integer from which minion should be moved
        newArea - Integer area to which minion should be moved
